Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants retroactive membership with tier IV status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Dana Kerstanski
Summary: Grants retroactive membership with tier IV status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Dana Kerstanski.
ActClause: AN ACT granting retroactive tier IV status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Dana Kerstanski
